description: Would-be master of an equally wealthy rival house to the http://anidb.net/ch26309 [Hanaukyous], annoyed with the condition she would become http://anidb.net/ch26303 [master of her house] if she married the head of the Hanaukyou family. She was even more enraged to find the http://anidb.net/ch3381 [current head] to be a whiny midget, but later grows to like him somewhat. She is a military fan and later strikes up an obsessive competition to beat http://anidb.net/ch3382 [Mariel] and prove herself, to the point of joining the Hanaukyou household as a http://anidb.net/ch26331 [maid]. Her bluntness and short temper sometimes comes in handy.
name: Jihiou Ryuuka
